title: CalC - Now on your wrist
summary: Makes calculation easier & faster. Connect your smart watch with phone & go on.
description: Simple, interactive & easy to use. Use our CalC to solve simple problems.Calculations made easier than ever before.  Our app works 100% natively even if your smart watch is not paired with phone.
descriptionHTML:
Simple, interactive & easy to use. Use our CalC to solve simple problems.
Calculations made easier than ever before.
Our app works 100% natively even if your smart watch is not paired with phone.
comments: I like the logo most What a cool app
Simple & Nice app,works really fast n smart ...tooooo good
Nice App,  Super Cool and Simple ...
Why so many permissions? Why do you need access to network, storage and accounts. Stealing personal data? This is a simple calculator
